summary.span: 封装一页可由 Windows Internet Explorer、 和 导航到和承载的内容。

span.span: Encapsulates a page of content that can be navigated to and hosted by Windows Internet Explorer, , and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 封装一页可以导航到，并具有以下键成员的内容： encapsulates a page of content that can be navigated, and has the following key members: - **生存期管理**: 。**Lifetime Management**: . - **导航**: 。**Navigation**: . - **外观**: ， ， ， ， ， ， ， 。**Appearance**: , , , , , , , . - **承载窗口外观**: ， ， 。**Host Window Appearance**: , , . 可以通过使用标记、 标记和代码隐藏中或代码定义一个页面。A page can be defined by using markup, markup and code-behind, or code. 页是出于以下原因的导航窗格中，包内容的首选的方式：A page is the preferred way to package content for navigation, for the following reasons: - 它很容易定义、 重用和管理。It is easy to define, reuse, and manage. - 它可以访问和使用，导航到它。It can access and use the that navigated to it. - 它可以更改标题、 宽度、 高度和导航[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]及其主机窗口的 (， ， ， )。It can alter the title, width, height, and navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of its host window (, , , ). - 它具有设计器支持[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualstu](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualstu-md.md)]。It has designer support in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualstu](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualstu-md.md)]. 可以从托管页面， ， ，或从浏览器。A page can be hosted from , , , or from a browser. 要托管的页可以是：To be hosted, a page can be: - 直接子级， ，或中的元素[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]。The direct child of a , , or element in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]. - 实例化并将设为值`Content`的属性， ，和。Instantiated and set as the value of the `Content` property of , , and . - 将设置为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]根源`Source`的属性或。Set as the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] source of the `Source` property of either or . - 将设置为独立应用程序中。Set as the in a standalone application. - 将设置为在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)]。Set as the in an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xbap-md.md)]. 应用程序通常有两个或多个页，可以使用以下机制之间导航：An application typically has two or more pages, which can be navigated between using the following mechanisms: - 以声明方式使用。Declaratively by using . - 以编程方式使用。Programmatically by using . - 以可视方式使用导航[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]的主机，包括[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]， ，和。Visually by using the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of the host, including [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)], , and . 使用页函数的结构化导航 ()，请参阅[结构化导航概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/structured-navigation-overview.md)并[导航拓扑概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/navigation-topologies-overview.md)。For structured navigation using page functions (), see [Structured Navigation Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/structured-navigation-overview.md) and [Navigation Topologies Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/navigation-topologies-overview.md). 该控件的依赖关系属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果属性设置为默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值时该控件将出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题使用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下面的示例显示了一个标准的页面的方式定义仅使用标记：The following example shows how a standard page is defined using only markup: [!code-xaml[PageSnippets#MarkupPageMARKUP](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageSnippets/CSharp/MarkupPage.xaml#markuppagemarkup)] 下面的示例演示如何使用定义的标准页面只代码：The following example shows how a standard page is defined using only code: [!code-csharp[PageSnippets#CodePageCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageSnippets/CSharp/CodePage.cs#codepagecodebehind)] [!code-vb[PageSnippets#CodePageCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageSnippets/visualbasic/codepage.vb#codepagecodebehind)] 下面的示例显示了一个标准的页面的方式使用标记和代码隐藏的组合来定义。The following example shows how a standard page is defined using a combination of markup and code-behind. [!code-xaml[PageSnippets#MarkupAndCodeBehindPageMARKUP](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageSnippets/CSharp/MarkupAndCodeBehindPage.xaml#markupandcodebehindpagemarkup)] [!code-csharp[PageSnippets#MarkupAndCodeBehindPageCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageSnippets/CSharp/MarkupAndCodeBehindPage.xaml.cs#markupandcodebehindpagecodebehind)] [!code-vb[PageSnippets#MarkupAndCodeBehindPageCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageSnippets/visualbasic/markupandcodebehindpage.xaml.vb#markupandcodebehindpagecodebehind)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不能一直保持活动状态 (请参阅)，它需要实现默认构造函数以允许[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]创建它时后退导航到的新实例或前进导航历史记录。If a is not being kept alive (see ), it needs to implement a default constructor to allow [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] to create a new instance of it when navigated to in back or forward navigation history.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool KeepAlive { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.KeepAlive : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在导航历史记录中保留 实例。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the instance is retained in navigation history.

value.span: 如果在导航历史记录中保留 实例，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the instance is retained in navigation history; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当页面第一次导航到的新实例创建类。When a page is first navigated to, a new instance of the class is created. 时 （后退或前进），在导航离开页面，页面项添加到导航历史记录。When a page is navigated away from (either back or forward), an entry for the page is added to navigation history. 默认情况下，该条目不引用的页对象。By default, the entry does not reference the page object. 相反，该条目包含页上的包统一资源标识符 (URI)。Instead, the entry contains a pack uniform resource identifier (URI) for the page. 导航到使用导航历史记录页面的项后，包 URI 用于创建页面的新实例。When the entry for the page is navigated to using navigation history, the pack URI is used to create a new instance of the page. 此行为是默认值，以避免过多的内存使用： 保留页面实例可能会快速消耗内存，尤其是那些具有大量内容。This behavior is the default, to avoid excessive memory use: retaining page instances can quickly consume memory, particularly those with a nontrivial amount of content. 这一事实，则可以存储在备份中的条目数和前进导航历史记录堆栈的无限制，则将增加此问题。This problem is augmented by the fact that there is no limit to the number of entries that can be stored in the back and forward stacks of navigation history. 与此相反，将存储为页面的 pack Uri 中有内存使用情况几乎没有影响。In contrast, storing pack URIs for pages has virtually no impact on memory consumption. 创建一个页面的新实例的主要副作用是页面状态不会到另一个记住从页面的一个实例。The main side effect of creating new instances of a page is that page state is not remembered from one instance of a page to another. 在这些情况下，Windows Presentation Foundation 提供了几种方法以记住状态。In these cases, Windows Presentation Foundation offers several techniques for remembering state. 若要使页保持活动状态，请设置属性设置为`true`(默认值是`false`)。To keep a page alive, you set the property to `true` (the default is `false`). > [!NOTE] > 实例化并导航到仅使用代码页 (例如，调用)，则会自动保持活动状态。Pages that are instantiated and navigated to using only code (for example, calling ), are automatically kept alive. 应避免设置到`true`除非你需要：You should avoid setting to `true` unless you need to: - 当页具有很多内容时，它可能需要很长时间才能实例化。When a page has a lot of content, it may take a long time to instantiate. 如果页面不保持活动状态，并且页面频繁地导航到，不断地实例化页面的成本可能会对用户体验产生负面影响。If the page is not kept alive, and the page is frequently navigated to, the cost of constantly instantiating the page may have a negative impact on the user experience. 但是，从性能角度看，您应依赖于默认设置和配置文件应用程序的性能;如果使用低于所需的应用程序范围的加载时间测试标识页，配置页面以保持活动状态，可能会解决此问题的一种方法。However, from a performance perspective, you should rely on the default settings and profile your application's performance; if testing identifies pages with load times that fall below the range required for your application, configuring the pages to be kept alive may be one way to solve the problem. > [!NOTE] > 将保持活动状态的页的条目不会保留在导航历史记录[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]如果用户导航离开并返回到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]。Entries for pages that are kept alive are not retained in navigation history of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] if a user navigates away from and back to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]. 只有不保持活动状态的页的日记条目保留在导航历史记录中。Only journal entries for pages that are not kept alive are retained in navigation history. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| > [!NOTE] > 此依赖属性上的元数据类型是，而不。The metadata type on this dependency property is , not . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]保留的实例跨多个导航的类。The following example shows how to use [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] to retain an instance of the class across multiple navigations. [!code-xaml[PageKeepAliveSnippets#SetPageKeepAliveXAML1](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageKeepAliveSnippets/XAML/HomePage.xaml#setpagekeepalivexaml1)] [!code-xaml[PageKeepAliveSnippets#SetPageKeepAliveXAML2](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageKeepAliveSnippets/XAML/HomePage.xaml#setpagekeepalivexaml2)] [!code-xaml[PageKeepAliveSnippets#SetPageKeepAliveXAMLForLang1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageKeepAliveSnippets/CSharp/HomePage.xaml#setpagekeepalivexamlforlang1)] [!code-xaml[PageKeepAliveSnippets#SetPageKeepAliveXAMLForLang2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageKeepAliveSnippets/CSharp/HomePage.xaml#setpagekeepalivexamlforlang2)] [!code-csharp[PageKeepAliveSnippets#SetPageKeepAliveCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageKeepAliveSnippets/CSharp/HomePage.xaml.cs#setpagekeepalivecodebehind)] [!code-vb[PageKeepAliveSnippets#SetPageKeepAliveCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageKeepAliveSnippets/visualbasic/homepage.xaml.vb#setpagekeepalivecodebehind)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NavigationService As NavigationService

summary.span: 获取页的宿主用来管理导航的导航服务。

span.span: Gets the navigation service that the host of the page is using to manage navigation.

value.span: 页的宿主用来管理导航的 对象；或者，如果宿主不支持导航，则为 。

span.span: The object that the host of the page is using to manage navigation, or if the host does not support navigation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 页面可以由多个类型的主机，包括承载， ， ，以及一个浏览器。Pages can be hosted by multiple types of hosts, including , , , and a browser. 页通常需要与他们的主机的导航提供页面中导航支持集成。Pages often need to integrate with their host's navigation to provide in-page navigation support. 但是，由于页面可能不知道在运行时，其主机将是什么，它不能直接将与集成其主机导航成员来执行此操作。However, because a page may not know what its host will be at run time, it cannot integrate directly with its host's navigation members to do so. 相反，它可以尝试使用导航服务，这是一种服务，支持浏览器样式的导航和封装类。Instead, it can attempt to use a navigation service, which is a service that supports browser-style navigation and is encapsulated by the class. 无法创建你自己实例，不过。You cannot create your own instance, though. 相反，托管类型，如， ，或浏览器创建其自己实例，它可以从访问属性。Instead, host types such as , , or a browser create their own instance that you can access from the property. 从返回的导航服务属性是实例由可视树上的第一个导航器管理的类。The navigation service that is returned from the property is the instance of the class that is managed by the first navigator up the visual tree. 如果未找到， `null` ，该值指示页面的主机不支持导航的返回。If one is not found, `null` is returned, indicating a page's host does not support navigation. > [!NOTE] > 类不支持导航，并且不提供导航服务。The class does not support navigation and does not provide a navigation service. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何页可检查导航服务是否可用并且，如果是这样，使用它导航回前一页。The following example shows how a page can check if a navigation service is available and, if so, use it to navigate back to the previous page. [!code-csharp[PageNavigationServiceSnippets#GetPageNavigationServiceCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageNavigationServiceSnippets/CSharp/HomePage.xaml.cs#getpagenavigationservicecodebehind)] [!code-vb[PageNavigationServiceSnippets#GetPageNavigationServiceCODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageNavigationServiceSnippets/visualbasic/homepage.xaml.vb#getpagenavigationservicecodebehind)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowsNavigationUI { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShowsNavigationUI : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie6](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie6-md.md)] 上的 的导航 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of a on [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie6](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie6-md.md)] is visible.

value.span: 如果宿主 的导航 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] 可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of a host is visible; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示导航[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]默认情况下启用浏览器样式向前和向后导航。 displays navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] by default to enable browser-style forwards and backwards navigation. 如果页设置为，会自动打开以承载该页面中的。If a page is set as the , automatically opens a to host the page in. 如果页面不想使用默认导航[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]，可以设置到`false`。If the page does not want to use the default navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)], it can set to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 因为[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]不会将导航条[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]有关[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie6](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie6-md.md)]，它提供了自己的导航[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]，它们可以显示或隐藏通过设置。Because [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] does not integrate with the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie6](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie6-md.md)], it provides its own navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)], which can be shown or hidden by setting . [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 未集成[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]导航[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]，并因此设置中的网页上[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)]不起作用。 does integrate with the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)] navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)], so setting on pages in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ie7](~/includes/tlasharptla-ie7-md.md)] has no effect. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]若要隐藏导航[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]的。The following example shows how to use [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] to hide the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] of a . [!code-xaml[PageShowsNavigationUISnippets#SetPageShowsNavigationUIXAML1](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageShowsNavigationUISnippets/XAML/HomePage.xaml#setpageshowsnavigationuixaml1)] [!code-xaml[PageShowsNavigationUISnippets#SetPageShowsNavigationUIXAML2](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageShowsNavigationUISnippets/XAML/HomePage.xaml#setpageshowsnavigationuixaml2)] [!code-xaml[PageShowsNavigationUISnippets#SetPageShowsNavigationUIXAMLLang1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageShowsNavigationUISnippets/CSharp/HomePage.xaml#setpageshowsnavigationuixamllang1)] [!code-xaml[PageShowsNavigationUISnippets#SetPageShowsNavigationUIXAMLLang2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageShowsNavigationUISnippets/CSharp/HomePage.xaml#setpageshowsnavigationuixamllang2)] [!code-csharp[PageShowsNavigationUISnippets#SetPageShowsNavigationUICODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageShowsNavigationUISnippets/CSharp/HomePage.xaml.cs#setpageshowsnavigationuicodebehind)] [!code-vb[PageShowsNavigationUISnippets#SetPageShowsNavigationUICODEBEHIND](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PageShowsNavigationUISnippets/visualbasic/homepage.xaml.vb#setpageshowsnavigationuicodebehind)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Title { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Title : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the title of the .
The title of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值情况下不显示属性，也不从承载的窗口的标题栏显示。The value of the property is not displayed by , nor is it displayed from the title bar of the window that is hosting a . 相反，应该设置更改宿主窗口的标题。Instead, you set to change the title of a host window. 此外可以用于生成一种导航内容的导航历史记录条目的名称。 can also be used to generate the name of the navigation history entry for a piece of navigated content. 使用以下数据块来自动构造导航历史记录条目名称，按优先级顺序：The following pieces of data are used to automatically construct a navigation history entry name, in order of precedence: - 附加属性。The attached attribute. - 属性。The property. - 属性和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]当前页The property and the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current page - 当前页的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current page. 如果您具有相关联对象使用一种导航历史记录中的内容，您可以指定显示的名称中的导航历史记录条目通过重写。If you have associated a object with a piece of content in navigation history, you can specify the name that appears in the navigation history entry by overriding . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double WindowHeight { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.WindowHeight : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 的宿主 或 的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of the host or of a .

value.span: 直接承载 的窗口的高度。

span.span: The height of a window that directly hosts a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当应用直接由一个窗口，其中包括托管： is only applied when a is hosted directly by a window, which includes: - - - [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] 如果由承载，并设置不起作用，但你仍可以获取的值。If a is hosted by a , setting has no effect, but you can still get the value of . 一个中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]可以仅使用若要更改的高度[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]; 不能通过设置更改高度， ，或。A in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] can only use to change the height of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]; the height cannot be changed by setting , , or . 最小高度[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]窗口为 150 像素。The minimum height of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] window is 150 pixels. 对于浏览器承载的页面，这意味着的值如果这会导致总高度不能应用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]窗口为少于 150 个像素。For browser-hosted pages, this means that the value of may not be applied if it would cause the total height of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] window to be less than 150 pixels. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置页面窗口的高度。The following example shows how to set the height of a window from a page. [!code-xaml[HOWTONavigationSnippets#SetPageWindowHeightXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTONavigationSnippets/CSharp/SetWindowHeightPage.xaml#setpagewindowheightxaml)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ WindowTitle { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.WindowTitle : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 的宿主 或 的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the title of the host or of a .

value.span: 直接承载 的窗口的标题。

span.span: The title of a window that directly hosts the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，承载页上，窗口的标题包括并[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]，是当前托管的文件的名称 (带有.xaml 扩展名如果页是松散[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，或如果在页面属于.xbap扩展名[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]).By default, the title of a window that hosts a page, including and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)], is the name of the file that is currently being hosted (with an .xaml extension if the page is loose [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], or an .xbap extension if the page is part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]). 页上可以更改默认值，通过设置其属性。A page can change the default by setting its property. 一旦页面以这种方式设置窗口的标题，窗口的标题不会更改直到另一个页面设置使用不同的值。Once a page sets the title of a window in this way, the window's title does not change until another page sets with a different value. > [!NOTE] > 必须是一个用于的窗口中的内容的最顶层产生任何影响; 如果内承载，例如，设置不会更改主机窗口的标题。The must be the topmost piece of content in a window for to have an effect; if a is hosted within a , for example, setting does not change the title of the host window. 此外可以用于生成一种导航内容的导航历史记录条目的名称。 can also be used to generate the name of the navigation history entry for a piece of navigated content. 使用以下数据块来自动构造导航历史记录条目名称，按优先级顺序：The following pieces of data are used to automatically construct a navigation history entry name, in order of precedence: - 附加属性。The attached attribute. - 属性。The property. - 属性和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]当前页The property and the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current page - 当前页的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current page. 如果您具有相关联对象使用一种导航历史记录中的内容，可以通过重写指定的导航历史记录元素的名称值。If you have associated a object with a piece of content in navigation history, you can specify the name value of a navigation history element by overriding . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置从一个页面的窗口标题。The following example shows how to set the title of a window from a page. [!code-xaml[HOWTONavigationSnippets#SetPageWindowTitleXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTONavigationSnippets/CSharp/SetWindowTitlePage.xaml#setpagewindowtitlexaml)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 的宿主 或 的宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of the host or of a .

value.span: 直接承载 的窗口的宽度。

span.span: The width of a window that directly hosts a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当应用直接由一个窗口，其中包括托管： is only applied when a is hosted directly by a window, which includes: - - - [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] 如果由承载，并设置不起作用，但你仍可以获取的值。If a is hosted by a , setting has no effect, but you can still get the value of . 一个中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)]可以仅使用若要更改的宽度[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]; 不能通过设置更改宽度， ，或。A in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xbap](~/includes/tlasharptla-xbap-md.md)] can only use to change the width of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]; the width cannot be changed by setting , , or . 最小宽度[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]窗口为 250 像素。The minimum width of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] window is 250 pixels. 对于浏览器承载的页面，这意味着的值如果这会导致的总宽度可能不会应用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)]窗口为小于 250 像素。For browser-hosted pages, this means that the value of may not be applied if it would cause the total width of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tlasharptla-iegeneric-md.md)] window to be less than 250 pixels. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置页面窗口的宽度。The following example shows how to set the width of a window from a page. [!code-xaml[HOWTONavigationSnippets#SetPageWindowWidthXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HOWTONavigationSnippets/CSharp/SetWindowWidthPage.xaml#setpagewindowwidthxaml)]
